name: The Rock (haha_yes_haha)
description:
Based on Harry Chapin’s The Rock:  a young boy dreams that the  giant boulder that has overlooked his town for centuries falls and destroys the town.  He’s convinced his dream will become a reality, so it’s up to the player to persuade the townsfolk and prevent the town’s destruction.

Final project for LMC 4720 - Interactive Narrative.
